items.sentence: Tom thanked Mary for helping him decorate his Christmas tree.
Tom told the police I was the one who had stolen his bicycle.
Tom told the police that I was the one who stole his bicycle.
I just don\'t want to have people thinking I\'m not sociable.
Tom needed something to do to keep his mind off his problems.
Tom opened the window even though his mother told him not to.
I doubt that Tom would ever consider selling his antique car.
I know Tom is a friend of yours, but I still don\'t like him.
I really wanted to go to Tom\'s concert, but it was sold out.
I have to be up early tomorrow morning, so I\'m going to bed.
